buffs.description: Upon reviving as an Elf, the enemy's crystal HP on the stage battle is partly reduced. Reduced by 1% for every 5-star unit and 2% for every 6 star unit. Applied even when in Time Shop, and the unit's maximum crystal HP cannot be reduced by more than 30%.
buffs.name: Weaken Crystal (Elf)

buffs.description: With the command of the Mystic Archer, the chance of the [High Elf Archer] making an additional cast will increase. Increases the efficiency by 1% per 5-star unit and 3% per 6-star unit. Applies even when the unit is in time shop and effects can be increased up to 40%.
buffs.name: Additional Attack (High Elf Archer)

hidden_abilites: At its first appearance, it increases the attack speed and movement speed of all ally units, and casts a shield that temporarily grants immunity against magical attacks.
Increases its movement speed by 10%, and its attack speed by 10%.
Increases the attack range and the critical damage of all units by 6%, and the movement speed of all units by 5%.
Significantly increases attack power and critical hit rate against enemy crystal.
Weaken Crystal (Elf) Limit Break : The reduction of enemy's crystal HP due to Weaken Crystal (Elf) is increased up to 30%.

Additional Attack (High Elf Archer) Limit Break : the chance of the High Elf Archer making an additional cast will increase up to 40% and the chance of making an additional Skill attack increases up to 30%.
description.skill1: Upon reviving as an Elf, the enemy's crystal HP on the stage is reduced. (1%, 2%, 3%, 4%, 5%)
description.skill2: Increase additional medal buff by pets (0%, 0%, 3%, 5%, 7%)
description.skill3: Awakens the hidden special ability of [ Senior Mystic Archer ]
